Title: Assault on 42
Writer: Joshua Fine (story), Jack Kirby (comic book), Brian Reed, Michael Ryan (story), Joe Simon (comic book), Christopher Yost (story)
Actors: Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Jeffrey Combs, Rick D. Wasserman, Roger Craig Smith
Plot: When an Avenger group visits SHIELD's special prison in the Negative Zone, they soon find themselves under siege by a mysterious enemy.
